link.description:
Every movement needs structure.  
Not to slow things down — but to make sure the work lasts.  

Governance in Open Nexus is not about red tape.  
It’s about trust, clarity, and momentum.  
How we make decisions, how we review contributions, how we keep the license open —  
this is the framework that lets creativity thrive without chaos.  

Think of it as the guardrails on a mountain road:  
they don’t stop you from driving fast,  
they just make sure everyone makes it safely to the summit.
